name: Divorced Dad Dating Simulator
description:
Use the arrow keys (or wasd) and space bar to advance the story and control the minigames.

Duncan is a divorced Dad discovering he is down to date. During discussion he drifts into dreams to decide whether to be dapper, or downright daft!

Complete minigames to woo Duncan's Date!

Created by:

Olly - minigame pixel art, programming, sound

The Voiderling - dating sim art, programming, dialogue

With music from opengameart.org
